options.title: -b, --brief
options.description: Does not prepend filenames to output lines.

options.title: -b, --brief
options.description: Does not prepend filenames to output lines.

options.title: -c
options.description: Prints a summary of the parsed magic file; usually used for debugging.

options.title: -h
options.description: Causes symlinks not to be followed. This is the default.

options.title: -i, --mime, --mime-type
options.description: Outputs MIME type strings rather than the more traditional human-readable ones. Thus it may say “text/plain” rather than “ASCII text”.

options.title: -i, --mime, --mime-type
options.description: Outputs MIME type strings rather than the more traditional human-readable ones. Thus it may say “text/plain” rather than “ASCII text”.

options.title: -i, --mime, --mime-type
options.description: Outputs MIME type strings rather than the more traditional human-readable ones. Thus it may say “text/plain” rather than “ASCII text”.

options.title: -s
options.description: Attempts to read block and character device files, not just regular files.

options.title: -W
options.description: Displays warnings when parsing the magic file or applying its tests. Usually used for debugging.
